remarks:
A bidirectional version of Extensionality.  Although this theorem "looks" like it is just a definition of equality, it requires the Axiom of Extensionality for its proof under our axiomatization.  See the comments for ~ ax-ext and ~ df-cleq .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2008.) 

---

 A bidirectional version of Extensionality.  Although this theorem "looks" like it is just a definition of equality, it requires the Axiom of Extensionality for its proof under our axiomatization.  See the comments for ~ ax-ext .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2008.)
statement:
axext4 $p |- ( x = y <-> A. z ( z e. x <-> z e. y ) ) $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
